nodes.text: A speeder truck or repulsortruck, alternatively spelled repulsor truck, was a large type of landspeeder repulsorlift vehicle used for ground transportation of cargo or personnel (a speeder truck typically had room for ten passengers). Some speeder trucks were also equipped with repeating blasters for protection.
The Imperials aligned Santhe Security made use of speeder trucks, and a speeder truck played an important role in the Battle of Dennaskar.
